words.source: H1431 (גָּדַל, 'to grow/become great'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'the child grew', ESV 'the child grew older', NASB 'the child grew' — all agree
H3206 (יֶלֶד, 'child/boy'), HTd/Ncmsa (article/noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'the child'
H935 (בּוֹא, 'to come/go'), HC/Vhw3fs/Sp3ms (conjunctive/Hiphil-wayyiqtol-3fs/suffix-3ms, causative = 'brought'); KJV 'she brought him', ESV 'she brought him', NASB 'she brought him' — all agree
H1323 (בַּת, 'daughter'), HR/Ncfsc (preposition-lamed/noun-common-feminine-singular-construct); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'to Pharaoh's daughter'
H1961 (הָיָה, 'to be/become'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'he became', ESV 'he became', NASB 'he became' — all agree
Preposition lamed + suffix 3fs, HR/Sp3fs; KJV 'her', ESV 'her', NASB 'her' — all agree
H1121 (בֵּן, 'son'), HR/Ncmsa (preposition-lamed/noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'her son', ESV 'her son', NASB 'her son' — all agree
H7121 (קָרָא, 'to call'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'she called', ESV 'She named', NASB 'she named' — all agree
H8034 (שֵׁם, 'name'), HNcmsc/Sp3ms (noun-common-masculine-singular-construct/suffix-3ms); KJV 'his name', ESV 'him', NASB 'him' — all agree
H559 (אָמַר, 'to say'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'she said', ESV 'she said', NASB 'she said' — all agree
H3588 (כִּי, 'because/for'), HC (conjunction); KJV 'Because', ESV 'Because', NASB 'Because' — all agree
H4480 (מִן, 'from/out of'), HR (preposition); KJV 'out of', ESV 'out of', NASB 'out of' — all agree
H4325 (מַיִם, 'water/waters'), HTd/Ncmpa (article/noun-common-masculine-plural-absolute); KJV 'the water', ESV 'the water', NASB 'the water' — all agree
H4871 (מָשָׁה, 'to draw out'), HVqp1cs/Sp3ms (Qal-perfect-1cs/suffix-3ms); etymology of Moses' name; KJV 'I drew him', ESV 'I drew him out', NASB 'I drew him out' — all agree
